title: About
text: exp. design is a Brooklyn-based design agency on a mission to create outstanding design experiences for organizations with social impact. Using strategy, design and tech backgrounds we can look at problems from many angles in order to determine the most innovative and effective solution.

My experience ranges from design research to prototyping and implementation using human-centered design, user experience design, identity design, interface design, front-end web development, and data visualization. Currently, I'm working on tech solutions to address access to justice problems for low-income New Yorkers.
